title: From Woods to Lamperti: These are the North Americans Chasing Success at the Giro d’Italia
content:
Five US riders and two Canadians are part of the North American contingent in this year's 'corsa rosa': How far can they go?

Read the full article at From Woods to Lamperti: These are the North Americans Chasing Success at the Giro d’Italia on Velo.
author: ahood
